content: **felted crochet hook case** **skill level ** easy **measurements ** 7 wide by 12 long after felting **gauge ** 20 double_crochet s = 10 with 2 strands of main color held together using size 11 5mm p crochet hook **crochet hooks ** 4 5mm g 11 5mm p materials berroco ultra alpaca 100 grs 1 ball #6231 saddle brown mc 1 ball #6286 verdigris mix cc crochet hooks sizes 4 50 mm g and 11 5 mm p matching sewing thread and sewing needle one 1 button body is felted then cluster section shown in contrast color is sewn on add button loop and button to finish
